DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy AL-54478 0.005 % compare Latanoprost 0.005 % AL-54478 Vehicle patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose either OAG OHT . Patients able comply schedule visit . Patients physical exam within 6 month Screening Visit . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Females childbearing potential meet 1 follow condition : ) Currently pregnant ; b ) Positive urine pregnancy test ; c ) Intend become pregnant ; ) Breast feeding ; e ) Not use highly effective birth control measure . Patients extreme narrow angle complete partial closure . Patients cup disc ratio 0.8 . Patients severe central visual field loss either eye . Patients chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease acute ocular infection inflammation . Patients ocular trauma within past 6 month intraocular surgery within past 6 month ocular laser surgery within past 3 month . Patients bestcorrect visual acuity less 20/80 . Patients ocular infection inflammation within past 3 month . Patients clinically relevant progressive retinal disease . Patients severe illness condition . Patients hypersensitivity prostaglandin analogu.e Patients unable safely discontinue IOPlowering medication washout . Patients currently therapy another investigational agent within 30 day prior Screening Visit . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
